A two-alarm house fire in the Bronx injured four individuals, while Brooklyn residents have been without heat for weeks; NYC's alternate side parking is suspended due to a snowstorm, and Mayor Mamdani faces challenges with a housing bill and a $12B budget deficit.

### Risks & Alerts

- Two firefighters and two residents injured in a two-alarm house fire in the Bronx. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Residents at 2342 Atlantic Avenue in Bronxville report being without heat for weeks. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Alternate side parking in NYC suspended through February 1 due to snowstorm. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Commuter ferry service to NYC disrupted due to frigid conditions causing ice on the Hudson River. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Travel around NYC remains uneven following the recent winter storm. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimgFBVV95cUxNQ0l5bDhCNmtzNk1qVzRBTTh3WTQtTnlzNllFU2dJVEdtdWt1TlJ1UUlmTzFQSXdMWU5LMlFqZnhYMUJCSlVkRlJxNW04aGZnVVJmMzZnbGhZTkZRX0xIcHRVVTdGc1V2a2ozazA4TU1SdEdXLVFuRFhGVGpBUm9OTVBpcFBXRWxybUtoUXJvTHVBQXhMa2FSYjNn?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- NYC Mayor Mamdani to propose tax hike due to a $12B budget deficit from the previous administration. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
